hyperdrive.product.title: Hyperdrive
hyperdrive.product.description: Connect to and accelerate your existing databases.
hyperdrive.create.planetscale.database_n: Sorry, we couldn't find any database in the %{organization} organization.
hyperdrive.create.planetscale.branch_not: Sorry, we couldn't find any branch in the %{database} database.
hyperdrive.create.planetscale.unauthenti: Read environment variables for integration database
hyperdrive.create.planetscale.success.su: Your Hyperdrive configuration %{configName} is ready to use.
hyperdrive.create.planetscale.success.in: Configure your Worker to use the Hyperdrive connection
2. Use Hyperdrive in your Worker code
Connect to your database through Hyperdrive for better performance
hyperdrive.create.heading: Create Hyperdrive Connection
hyperdrive.create.subheading: Connect and accelerate an existing database using one of the methods below.
hyperdrive.create.error.no_access_token: Failed to resolve Access Service Token.
hyperdrive.create.public.description: Connect to a publicly accessible database
hyperdrive.create.private.description: Connect to a private database with credentials
hyperdrive.create.private.networking_det: Configure the Zero Trust suite to connect Hyperdrive to a private database
hyperdrive.create.details.heading: Database connection details
hyperdrive.create.details.subheading: Hyperdrive stores and encrypts your connection details securely. Passwords are never returned in plain text.
hyperdrive.create.access_token.heading: Access Service Authentication Token
hyperdrive.create.access_token.subheadin: The service token will be used to verify that requests to your tunnel originate from this Hyperdrive configuration.
hyperdrive.create.inputs.access_applicat: A policy will be added to this Access application to validate that requests made from Hyperdrive to the tunnel's hostname have the required service token.
hyperdrive.create.inputs.name.label: Configuration name
hyperdrive.create.inputs.name.tooltip: Must be between 1 and 63 characters and can only contain lowercase alphanumeric characters and hypens.
hyperdrive.create.inputs.host.label: Database host
hyperdrive.create.inputs.port.label: Port
hyperdrive.create.inputs.user.label: User
hyperdrive.create.inputs.password.label: Password
hyperdrive.create.inputs.scheme.label: Database Type
hyperdrive.create.inputs.database.label: Database name
hyperdrive.create.caching.heading: Caching
hyperdrive.create.caching.subheading: Improve database query performance by caching results.
hyperdrive.create.caching.tooltip: Cache database query results to improve performance. Uses default settings: 60 seconds max age, 15 seconds stale-while-revalidate. This can be changed in the settings.
hyperdrive.create.certificates.heading: TLS/SSL Certificates
hyperdrive.create.certificates.subheadin: Configure custom certificates for secure database connections.
hyperdrive.create.inputs.private_host.la: Host is part of your Cloudflare Zero Trust private network.
hyperdrive.create.inputs.tunnel.tooltip: Hyperdrive connects to this tunnel to access your private database securely.
hyperdrive.create.inputs.tunnel.no_tunne: To complete private database set up, you need to <0>create a tunnel</0> and configure a hostname using the Zero Trust Suite.
hyperdrive.create.inputs.hostname.toolti: Hyperdrive uses the hostname of the tunnel to route database traffic to it.
hyperdrive.create.automatic_creation.ser: Automatically generate a new service token
hyperdrive.create.public.clientCert.uplo: How to upload mTLS client certificate and private key pair
hyperdrive.create.inputs.ca.label: SSL Certificate Authority (CA) Certificate
hyperdrive.create.input.sslmode.descript: Specify the SSL mode that Hyperdrive uses to securely connect to your database. If required, configure the certificate files required for your SSL mode.
hyperdrive.settings.ca.heading: Custom certificates
hyperdrive.settings.ca.subheading: Use custom certificates to secure your connection with server verification and client verification.
hyperdrive.settings.ca.label: Certificate authority:
hyperdrive.settings.client_cert.label: Client certificate:
hyperdrive.settings.sslmode.label: SSL Mode:
hyperdrive.table.empty.subheader: Create a new configuration to get started. You will need a Postgres or MySQL connection string.
hyperdrive.table.empty: Get started with Hyperdrive by creating your first configuration.
hyperdrive.table.empty_search_result: No configurations matched your search. Try searching for a different name.
hyperdrive.metrics.heading: Summary
hyperdrive.metrics.subheading: Metrics aggregated accross this Hyperdrive configuration.
hyperdrive.metrics.no_data: No data available for this time range
hyperdrive.metrics.error.generic: There was an error fetching metrics data.
hyperdrive.metrics.queries.description: Queries that have been handled by this Hyperdrive configuration by cached status.
hyperdrive.metrics.queries.title: Queries
hyperdrive.metrics.bytes.title: Result Bytes
hyperdrive.metrics.bytes.description: Total number of bytes returned by the Hyperdrive config.
hyperdrive.metrics.latency.title: Latency
hyperdrive.metrics.errors.title: Errors
hyperdrive.metrics.errors.description: Number of queries that fail due to an error.
hyperdrive.settings.caching_settings.max: Max duration for which items should persist in the cache, in seconds.
hyperdrive.settings.caching_settings.sta: Number of seconds cache may serve the response after it becomes stale.
Value must be equal or greater than 0 or less than the value of max age.
hyperdrive.settings.origin_conn_lim_sett: How many connections Hyperdrive can make to your origin database.
The soft maximum number of connections Hyperdrive can make to your origin database. Hyperdrive may make more connections than this soft maximum to provide fault tolerance and high availability.
Limit must be equal or greater than %{minValue}
hyperdrive.settings.delete_config.conten: Deleting this Hyperdrive configuration cannot be undone and may cause any Workers bound to it to no longer function as intended.
hyperdrive.delete_modal.title: Delete Configuration?
hyperdrive.delete_modal.warning: Deleting this configuration will permanently remove it and prevent it from being used in your Workers.
hyperdrive.rotate_password.success: Your PlanetScale database password has been rotated successfully
hyperdrive.rotate_password.description: Password rotation replaces your existing password with a new one for improved security.
hyperdrive.rotate_password.modal_descrip: Password rotation replaces your existing password with a new one for improved security. However, it may break applications that are not using Hyperdrive and still rely on the old password.
hyperdrive.overview.queries.free_tooltip: Your account is limited to %{maxQueries} queries per day. To remove this limit, <0>upgrade your plan</0>.
hyperdrive.overview.queries.paid_tooltip: Unlimited queries via Hyperdrive are included in your plan. To learn more visit the Hyperdrive <0>documentation</0>.
